sidebar.tenantsDesc: Tenants that rent your asset property.
sidebar.tenureContractsDesc: Tenure contract of the asset property and tenant.

register.desc1: By register, you will experience how this tool can help you manage your property effectively.
register.desc2: Free To Use If you're just started to manage your property.
register.desc3: We will be helping you as much as needed to familiar and be productive in Propster.io.
register.registerSuccessfullyText: You have registered an account in Propster.io successfully.
register.verifyEmail: Please make sure to verify the email before logging in.
register.moreQuestions: If you have more questions, don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to help!
register.noVerificationEmail: If you have not received any verification email, click the Resend Verification Email.

forgotPassword.forgotPasswordSuccessfully: If you've provided registered e-mail, you should get recovery e-mail shortly.

resetPassword.resetPasswordSuccessfully: We have emailed your password reset link!

selectRole.title: Please Select A Role
selectRole.landlordDesc: Having the access to multiple features such as Tenant management, Asset Managements and Assets Analytics.
selectRole.tenantDesc: Having access to pay rents, scheduling time with Vendors and Landlords.
selectRole.agentDesc: Having access to manage multiple landlords, and to all the features provided to landlords.
selectRole.vendorDesc: Having access to collect fee from agents, landlords or tenants.
selectRole.changeRoleLater: You will be able to select another role later.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.planningText: The idea of Propster.io has been come out at April 2021 from our team. Propster.io will be all-in-one property management tool that includes managing property, rental, tenants, vendor, and generating dashboard and report.
roadmap.webBasedReportingToolsText: Web Based Reporting Tools includes all the basic features, such as managing property, rental and tenants as landlord role. With the data inserted, the dashboard will generate basic information and report that allows landlord to have basic insights of their properties.
roadmap.mobileAppDeploymentText: We plan to release Propster.io to the Adnroid and iOS mobile app platforms. The mobile app will possess all the features in Web Based Reporting Tools, with better layout on smaller screens. User can expect the tenant role to be released at this stage, with the online payment method. Tenant will be allowed to pay their fees through online payment, such as debit/credit card, bank transfer, or even e-wallet.
roadmap.vendorRecruitmentPropertyInsightText: We expect to recruit vendors at this stage that are providing services, such as electronic repairing, furniture purchasing, house moving and so on, to assist landlords and tenants on their renting experience. We also plan to collaborate with property listing company to share their data with us, such as average renting fee, to generate more precise information for property insights.
roadmap.rentalRewardSystemText: By cooperating with landlords and vendors, we will publish the rental reward system that allows tenants to pay their renting fees with discount.
roadmap.customerServicesOpsTeamText: We will setup Customer Services Operation Team to support landlords, tenants, and vendors on their daily problems. At this stage, landlord will be managing their property effortlessly.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.learnTutorialText: Check out this tutorial for learning to use Propster.io.
tutorial.landlordDesc: Landlord is able to manage property asset and tenant, by generating tenure contract, requesting payment from tenant, and recording expenses.

dashboard.welcomeText: Welcome to Propster.io. It is our honour to serve you. If you have any inquiry or feedback, please leave us a message using the Facebook Messenger at the bottom right. We will attend to you ASAP! Thank you!
dashboard.overdueIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that have already been due over the due date (incl. of Grace Period).
dashboard.upcomingIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that you are expected to receive in the set given time range.
dashboard.overdueExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are been due to. For eg. Maintaince fees that is overdue.
dashboard.upcomingExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are expected to pay in the set given time range.

alert.basicTierTenantCount: You can only add 3 Tenants per Asset with free tier. Get ADVANCED or PRO version to add more tenants.
